person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: Oh my, stress can be a real bear! How about meeting Bruno, the mindfulness specialist? He can help you chill out and focus on your studies!

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Yay! Let’s call Bruno, your mindfulness buddy! He’s going to give you the best tips to relax and conquer that exam!
